DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine effect probiotic , Lactobacillus johnsonii N6.2 , safety , gastrointestinal function , wellness , fecal bacteria blood biomarkers healthy individual .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Host Response Lactobacillus Johnsonii
DOC.detailed_description: Healthy adult volunteer ( 30 individual ) 18-50 year age recruit University Florida randomly distribute two group . This study divide 3 phase : baseline , intervention ( study treatment ) washout . Participants receive either probiotic placebo intervention phase . During baseline phase , blood fecal sample collect 1 week intervention initiation . On day schedule blood draw , participant need arrive fast overnight , light breakfast provide blood draw . Starting day 1 intervention phase , second baseline blood sample collect participant begin study intervention ( probiotic placebo ) . Participants consume 1 capsule ( probiotic placebo ) daily 8 week , blood stool sample collect processed ( around week 2 , 4 8 intervention phase ) . A Fisher Scientific commode specimen collection system provide stool collection . The stool collection kit may take home ( participant ask drop stool within 4 hour defecation ) fecal sample collection may use restroom clinical lab Food Science Human Nutrition Building kit provide use . In wash-out phase , participant consume capsule ( either probiotic placebo ) , provide blood stool sample ( around week 12 ) . Throughout study , participant provide total 5 stool sample 6 blood sample . Participants ask complete daily weekly questionnaire throughout phase study , ask quality life ( physical functioning , mental functioning , level sleep , etc . ) , gastrointestinal function , dietary intake . These assessment self-reported via online questionnaire . In event internet access available portion study , paper copy questionnaire may provide .
DOC.criteria: To participate study individual must 1850 year old . willing complete multiple questionnaire via computer . willing take probiotic placebo capsule daily 8 week . willing provide 1 stool week 0 , 2 , 4 , 8 12 study . willing provide blood sample week 1 , 0 , 2 , 4 , 8 12 study . daily access computer internet access entire 13wk study . willing provide social security number To participate study individual must NOT currently take medication constipation , diarrhea psychological disorder ( depression , anxiety , insomnia etc. ) . take antibiotic within past four week prior randomization . currently take probiotic supplement want discontinue minimum two week prior study currently treat disease illnesses gastrointestinal disease ( gastric ulcer , Crohn 's , ulcerative colitis , etc . ) , chronic disease like diabetes kidney disease , immunecompromising disease condition ( HIV , AIDS , hepatitis , cancer , transplant patient etc . ) currently receive medical treatment stress induce symptoms/disorders current smoker
